articles.author: Tyrone Marshall
articles.title: Premier League and FA release statements on breakaway leagues after Manchester United protests - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Man Utd fans protested against the Glazers' ownership of their club on Sunday in the wake of the failed European Super League project.
articles.content: The Premier League are planning to hold the big six who tried to join the European Super League "accountable for their decisions and actions" after they and the Football Association released fresh st… [+4458 chars]

articles.author: By James Frater, CNN
articles.title: EU plans summer opening for vaccinated tourists - CNN
articles.description: After nearly a year of closed borders, the European Union proposes opening up to fully vaccinated global travelers, a move that should help revive tourism industry fortunes.
articles.content: (CNN) After nearly a year of closed borders, the European Union could open in June to fully vaccinated vacationers from countries with low Covid infection rates in time for summer under a plan reveal… [+3397 chars]

articles.author: RAJES PAUL
articles.title: Badminton: Positive attitude - The Star Online
articles.description: PETALING JAYA: It was not an ending that Viktor Axelsen had wanted at the European Championships but the Dane is ready to move on after testing positive for Covid-19 in Ukraine.
articles.content:

articles.author: Sean Martin
articles.title: Asteroid simulation by NASA and ESA confirms Earth not prepared for major strike - Daily Express
articles.description: AN ASTEROID simulation event held by NASA and the European Space Agency has confirmed has one thing: eventually, a major asteroid is going to strike our planet and we need to prepare better for it.
